author: somer112
content: Is it possible to detect how many active stakers are merge-ready? Would be useful to have some assurance that folks are properly configured and synced.

author: ajsutton
content: Not that I know of. But currently the advice has mostly been to wait before getting set up for MainNet because the TTD hasn’t been set and there are unfortunately still some quirks with the engine api not starting or expecting a difference TTD in the transitionConfiguration call that causes warnings if you switch over now. So I’d expect preparedness to be low now but likely a lot of people ready and able to do the config changes when we say “go”.
